topic.title: Registering Actions to Create or Open Documents for Configured Plugins

keywords.indexterm: Register create or open document actions

body.p: has a user-friendly Dashboard where you can open and create new documents for particular repository service plugins (such as SharePoint, WebDAV, or Git). As long as a repository service plugin registers a create and open action, then it will include a tab with actions for creating and opening documents.

section.title: Register Create and Open actions for the Dashboard
section.p: Result: The registered create and open actions will appear in your Dashboard in the tab for your particular file repository service.
